import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Customer_layout from '../../../pages/customer_layout'; import { useParams, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; export default ({ data, addToCart }) => { const history = useHistory(); const { id } = useParams(); const singleProduct = data.find(product => product.id == id ); const local = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')); const [ products, setProducts ] = useState([]); console.log(products); const onHandleChange = (e) => { console.log(e.target.value); const a = {id: singleProduct.id, name: singleProduct.name, image: singleProduct.image, price: singleProduct.price, count: e.target.value}; setProducts([a]); console.log(local); } const onHandleClick = async() => { await setProducts([...products,local]); console.log(products); console.log(local); localStorage.setItem('cart', JSON.stringify(products)); //history.push('/cart'); } const section = <>

{singleProduct.name}

{singleProduct.price}

Add To Cart

  • Ordering Information
  • Specifications
Material Description Packaging
OTC022401 Pain Management: Acetaminophen PM Extra-Strength Caplets, 500 mg, 100/Bottle 1 BT
OTC022401 Pain Management: Acetaminophen PM Extra-Strength Caplets, 500 mg, 100/Bottle 144/CS
OTC022401 Pain Management: Acetaminophen PM Extra-Strength Caplets, 500 mg, 100/Bottle 1 EA
HPIS CODE 999_200_40_0
HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS ONLY No
LATEX FREE Yes, No
MEDICATION ROUTE Topical
return ( <> ) }
